result.trip_overview_narrative: Bermuda High School offers international exchange, conferences, and service projects abroad through its membership in the Round Square programme. The school also organizes theme-based camps with field trips during school holidays and July for younger students.

evidence.quote: BHS is the only Round Square Member school in Bermuda. Students have access to this internationally acclaimed programme which allows them to participate in exchanges, conferences and service projects abroad.

During school holidays and the month of July, theme-based camps are held from 8:00am until 5:30pm. Arts and crafts, field trips, guest speakers, science activities, baking, and costume parties are a few of the activities the campers engage in.

During school holidays and the month of July, themed based camps are held from 8:00am until 5:30pm. Arts and crafts, field trips, guest speakers, science activities, baking, and costume parties are a few of the activities the campers engage in.

unknowns: specific destinations for Round Square trips
